tool_description:
A tool to help developers to aggregate Indonesian news from different sources to help their projects.

New endpoints will be added every few days
name: Indonesian News Aggregator
title: Indonesian News Aggregator

api_list.name: V1 - Detik Get News Index
api_list.description: Retrieves Index of News from Detik.com
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://indonesian-news-aggregator.p.rapidapi.com/v1/detik/index/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "indonesian-news-aggregator.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: V1 - Detik Get News Content
api_list.description: Retrieves news content and metadatas according to sources added
